entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Buffalo Narrows Airport 09:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Smoke. High 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Widespread smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain overnight. Widespread smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 08 May 2016
